api_list.api_description: Retrieve a set of random users.

optional_parameters.name: results
optional_parameters.description: The number of users to return.

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: Filter results by gender. Values can be 'male' or 'female'.

query: Can you get details of two random female users, and generate five version-4 UUIDs to be assigned to different profiles?
